title: Baby care: feeding
creator_credit: Pennsylvania State College Productions, Irving C. Boerlin and Paul H Seilzinger
brief_description: The steps necessary when prepapring to feed an infant are dealt with in detail, with stress on the importance of cleanliness and exactness. (Deals mainly with artificial feeding).
